name: Minor Inconvenience (1studio)
description:
Minor inconvenience is a game about a not so minor inconvenience. To fall through the ground in a mineshaft isn't the best thing in the world.

This game was made for the ludum dare 48th game jam. The falling is procedurally generated. Your goal is to go as deep as posible and doge the  objects that you encounter along the way. It was a lot of fun and I hope you will like it.

To control the falling miner use the arrow keys or A and D.
